sentences.en: Another limitation is the lack of availability of accurate equilibrium constants.
sentences.cn: 平衡计算的另一局限性是缺乏准确的可利用的平衡常数.

sentences.en: Damage limitation measures have been introduced.
sentences.cn: 已经推出了损害控制措施。

sentences.en: I am willing to accept certain limitation on my freedom.
sentences.cn: 我愿意接受对我自由的某些限制.

sentences.en: It is both her incomparable strength and her ultimate limitation.
sentences.cn: 这既是她的无比的力量,又是她的最终局限性.

sentences.en: It is likewise a severe limitation.
sentences.cn: 它同样存在严格的局限性.

sentences.en: On migrated sections migration noise can become the equivalent limitation.
sentences.cn: 在偏移剖面上,偏移噪声成为等效的界限.

sentences.en: Owing to the limitation of our knowledge, there must be mistakes and errors in the book.
sentences.cn: 由于我们水平有限, 本书少不了会有缺点和错误.

sentences.en: The chief limitation of the harvester is its inability to separate seed from debris.
sentences.cn: 这种收割机的主要缺点是不能把种子和夹杂物分开来.

sentences.en: The first electronic calculations were plagued by storage limitation.
sentences.cn: 最初的电子计算技术由于存贮技术的落后而不能顺利发展.

sentences.en: The meeting was merely an exercise in damage limitation.
sentences.cn: 这次会议只是控制损失的一项举措。

sentences.en: Their main limitation is that they are incapable of rising to the ionosphere.
sentences.cn: 他们主要局限性是不能上升到电离层.

sentences.en: They maintain that rules about dress are an unacceptable limitation of personal freedom.
sentences.cn: 他们认定有关穿衣的规则是对个人自由的限制,是无法接受的.

sentences.en: This technique is useful but it has its limitations .
sentences.cn: 这种技术实用，但也有局限性。

sentences.en: We shall continue to work for the limitation of nuclear arms.
sentences.cn: 我们将继续为限制核子武器而努力.

sentences.en: Within the limitation of quantity you are free to do as you choose.
sentences.cn: 在这个限量内你可以任便.

sentences.en: Within the limitation you are free to do as you choose.

words.tran_cn: [机][电] 限制器，[电子] 限幅器；限制者
限制；限度；极限；追诉时效；有效期限

phrases.tran_cn: 限制基金；处理船主责任范围以外的索赔的基金

trans.tran_cn: 限制，局限，极限，起限制作用的规则（或事实、条件）
trans.tran_en: the act or process of controlling or reducing something
